cashAccountTypes.name: Current
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used to post debits and credits when no specific account has been nominated

cashAccountTypes.name: CashPayment
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for the payment of cash

cashAccountTypes.name: Charges
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for charges if different from the account for payment.

cashAccountTypes.name: CashIncome
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for payment of income if different from the current cash account

cashAccountTypes.name: Commission
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for commission if different from the account for payment.

cashAccountTypes.name: ClearingParticipantSettlementAccount
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used to post settlement debit and credit entries on behalf of a designated Clearing Participant

cashAccountTypes.name: LimitedLiquiditySavingsAccount
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for savings with special interest and withdrawal terms.

cashAccountTypes.name: Loan
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for loans

cashAccountTypes.name: Marginal Lending
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for a marginal lending facility

cashAccountTypes.name: Money Market
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for money markets if different from the cash account

cashAccountTypes.name: NonResidentExternal
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for non-resident external

cashAccountTypes.name: Overdraft
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account is used for overdrafts.

cashAccountTypes.name: OverNightDeposit
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for overnight deposits.

cashAccountTypes.name: OtherAccount
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account not otherwise specified.

cashAccountTypes.name: Settlement
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used to post debit and credit entries, as a result of transactions cleared and settled through a specific clearing and settlement system.

cashAccountTypes.name: Salary
cashAccountTypes.definition: Accounts used for salary payments.

cashAccountTypes.name: Savings
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for savings.

cashAccountTypes.name: Tax
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for taxes if different from the account for payment.

cashAccountTypes.name: TransactingAccount
cashAccountTypes.definition: A transacting account is the most basic type of bank account that you can get. The main difference between transaction and cheque accounts is that you usually do not get a cheque book with your transacting account and neither are you offered an overdraft facility.

cashAccountTypes.name: Cash Trading
cashAccountTypes.definition: Account used for trading if different from the current cash account.
